0: Serena Williams' Wedding Huge Stars, Tennis Themes ... and Bell Biv DeVoe! NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Serena Williams' Wedding, Huge Stars, Tennis Themes and Bell Biv DeVoe! NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Here's one case where Bell Biv DeVoe broke their own rule -- and totally trusted a big butt and a smile ... because they were some of the VIPs at Serena Williams' wedding!! NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR It all went down in New Orleans on Thursday night -- where huge stars like Kelly Rowland, Ciara, La La Anthony, Boris Kodjoe, Kim Kardashian and Caroline Wozniacki partied until the early morning. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR And here's the first look at Serena's dress ... NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR A post shared by Serena Williams (@serenawilliams) on Nov 17, 2017 at 5:27pm PST NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR As we previously reported, Serena and her (now) husband Alexis Ohanian went all out on the party -- and due to the fact the guys from BBD were there and wearing matching clothing ... we're guessing they performed live. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR The decorations were tennis-themed -- the guest seating placards were in the shape of Wimbledon and U.S. Open trophies. Pretty damn awesome.
